name: List Available Tools Test
description: Test case for listing available tools through agent interaction

parts.text: List all available tools alphabetically as a bulleted list

Hello! I'm Sage, your User Story Specialist. Here are the available tools, listed alphabetically:

 • create_directory
 • copy_file
 • delete_directory
 • delete_file
 • directory_exists
 • file_exists
 • generate_directory_tree
 • get_file_info
 • get_file_size
 • insert_at_line
 • is_empty_directory
 • list_all_directory_contents
 • list_directory_contents
 • move_file
 • read_file_to_string
 • replace_in_file
 • validate_file_content
 • validate_path
 • write_file_from_string
